name: Shubham Kushwah
title: Full-Stack Developer & System Architect
summary: Senior Full-Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience specialized in architecting scalable digital ecosystems and high-performance web systems. Expert in harmonizing frontend excellence (React/Next.js) with robust backend infrastructures (Node.js/Express/Microservices). Proven track record in delivering enterprise-grade platforms with a focus on system reliability, high-availability APIs, and complex data orchestration. Skilled in optimizing end-to-end performance and leveraging AI-driven engineering workflows to maximize product quality.

highlights: Architected and delivered end-to-end full-stack solutions for large-scale government platforms, bridging high-performance frontends with robust backend architectures.
Engineered and optimized secured RESTful APIs and database schemas, ensuring low-latency data flow and high availability for mission-critical services.
Collaborated on full-cycle system design, focusing on security (Zero-Trust), cloud-native scalability, and seamless integration between Node.js services and React-driven interfaces.
Architected and integrated distributed backend services with Angular-driven systems, significantly improving system throughput and transaction reliability.
Transformed monolithic architectures into scalable microservices using Node.js and REST ecosystems, reducing deployment bottlenecks by 40%.
Implemented enterprise-grade SSR/SSG patterns for SEO dominance and engineered automated testing pipelines ensuring 95%+ code coverage.
Built and maintained e-commerce websites using WordPress, Bootstrap, and custom JavaScript, increasing sales and conversions.
Enhanced real-time data rendering using AJAX and jQuery and reduced page load times by leveraging lazy loading and CDN strategies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering
education.institution: Hindustan College of Science & Technology, Mathura
